about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Meet the team that ensures the security of your business and property.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
content: With over 10 years of experience in private security, Alpha Partner Security provides intelligent and customized solutions for companies that want uncompromising safety.

We differentiate ourselves through professionalism, state-of-the-art technology, and a constant commitment to quality. Each intervention is supported by a carefully trained team, dedicated to protecting our clients' assets and peace of mind.
We emphasize solid partnerships, confidentiality, and an approach tailored to each client's needs. For us, security means trust built through concrete actions.

items.title: Performance
items.content: We commit to delivering services at the highest standards, with rapid, efficient interventions and teams prepared for any scenario.

items.title: Integrity
items.content: Transparency and honesty are the foundation of our relationship with each client. We honor our promises, without exception.

items.title: Discretion
items.content: We protect not just assets, but also confidentiality — an essential element in any lasting partnership.

experience.title: The Experience That Recommends Us
items: We have built a solid reputation over time based on results, not just words.
Our clients know they can rely on us for 24/7 security, whether we're talking about rapid interventions, intelligent systems, or complex surveillance.
We are always one step ahead, so that clients can focus on what truly matters — the peace of mind and continuity of their business.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Dedicated professionals ensuring the protection and security of our clients.
team.quote: Security is not just a service we offer, but a promise we commit to fulfill for each client. This is our mission, every day.

cta.title: Would you like a free assessment of your security needs?
cta.description: Contact us today to discuss your security needs and receive a personalized quote.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide quality services for the safety and protection of your facilities.

services.title: Security and protection, rapid intervention
services.content: We provide human security services, patrolling and rapid response to events, 24/7. Our teams are trained, equipped and coordinated through our own dispatch center. We respond promptly to protect our clients.

services.title: Access control systems
services.content: We implement modern access control solutions for residential and industrial buildings. Biometric control, RFID cards or PIN codes. Access is managed safely and efficiently, with centralized reports.

services.title: Anti-theft system installation
services.content: We install professional anti-theft systems, integrated with sensors, sirens and real-time alerts. Customized configuration for homes, offices and commercial spaces. We ensure continuous monitoring through our dispatch center.

services.title: Fire detection system installation
services.content: We install and configure certified fire systems compliant with IGSU, P118/3 and EN54 standards. We ensure rapid detection, efficient warning and automatic triggering of safety measures. We comply with all legal requirements for optimal protection of lives and property.

services.title: Monitoring Center / Surveillance
services.content: We continuously monitor all alarms and field events through our own dispatch center. We intervene quickly in case of burglary, fire or emergencies. Our infrastructure is redundant and secure.

services.title: Technical systems maintenance
services.content: We provide periodic maintenance and technical interventions for all installed systems. Quick checks, updates and repairs for optimal operation. Flexible service contracts available.

services.title: Auto access barriers and gate automation systems
services.content: We provide automated solutions for auto access control: barriers, sliding or swing gates. Robust systems, remote-controlled or integrated into access control systems. Aesthetics and functionality at high standards.

services.title: Data and voice networks for companies
services.content: We design and install professionally structured data and voice communication networks. Stable, fast and scalable solutions for offices and industrial halls. Updated technology and optimized cable routing.

services.title: Video/audio intercom for offices and private properties
services.content: Audio and video intercom systems for offices and private properties. We offer visibility, control and efficient communication at access points. Discreet installation and integration with other security systems.

services.title: CCTV video surveillance
services.content: We install modern surveillance cameras with night vision, HD resolution and remote access. Intelligent configuration with cloud or local storage. Complete monitoring for any type of location.

cta.title: Protect your investment with reliable security solutions
cta.description: Our experts are available for a complete and personalized assessment of your security needs. Schedule a free consultation today.
